1073950979521957888.text:
Many of you are asking if ICOs have to refund initial investors in crypto or fiat.

The lawyer's answer: if they try to refund the amount with less value, they'll get sued by investors saying the greater value is required, no matter which it is. Two options: pay more or litigate.
